channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pests on Green, 15th December
item.description:
Vermin on green outside of 172 with holes. Please can this be looked into.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Students rubbish, 15th December
item.description:
Pls can the pucker who does Hutchins road, also puck up rubbish from the path into Butt's wood? Where hutchins starts at underpass from town center, it goes up to the school, bears right, but there is,also part that bears left, into park, students from both schools use daily to get to bus stop. They live to dump their rubbish. Newspaper there as bern 8 days, one carton has been there 2 weeks, pls can he/she take 2min to also pick that pavement . Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hutchins Road, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 40cm wide pot hole on the left hand side of the road ( travelling from Crockenhill towards St Marys cray), 15th December
item.description:
Pot hole needs fixing. Actually this stretch of road always has potholes as it needs to be resurfaced!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crockenhill Road, St Mary Cray, Greater London

item.title: Bin bags dumped on street too early, 15th December
item.description:
Bins are put out too early and attracts foxes and mice. Cat litter is inside the bin and foxes always rip which spills onto the street where people step.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Haggerston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household rubbish fly tipped near bin opposite 7 Ethelbert Rs, 15th December
item.description:
House hold rubbish dumped bed, bin bags etc near bin in Ethelbert road opposite No 7 Ethelbert Road. Sofa dumped on side of No 7 Ethelbert Road near Sound Studio. Bins obstructing pathway No 5 Ethelbert Road , no access for Prams and Wheelchair access. Bins overfilled back of Smoke also parked cars over pathway at rear of smoke on a regular basis obstructing access for Wheelchair users, Pedestrians and Prams. The issue has been going on for some time

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ethelbert Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car has been here for months, 15th December
item.description:
I believe the car has been left for around 7 months. This is my third complaint about this car which has been abandoned, it takes up limited parking options and is a mess to the road and community

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hervey Road, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paving slabs damaged, raised and some tilt, 15th December
item.description:
The paving slabs are now at a point of serious damage and I have seen two people fall over in three weeks, with the latest being this morning by a relatively frail elderly lady walking her dog. All of the slabs have significant cracks and some of the tiles start to tilt quite substantially as you walk on them. This issue is widespread on the footpath situated on the western side of the road and causes serious danger to health.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82-92, Parish Gate Drive, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public bin needs to be removed, 15th December
item.description:
There is a public bin that is always being fly-tipped at, loads of rubbish, excrement etc. A month ago, a council officer said this would be removed however it is still yet to be removed. Please remove this bin from outside the property.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Culford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unswept leaves and litter, 15th December
item.description:
The road has not been swept for months and the leaves are now stuck to the pavement and road. They are slippery when wet and dangerous to those that are unsteady on their feet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clement Road, Penge, Greater London

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victorian Grove, Hackney, London

item.title: Substantial quantities of unswept leaves, 15th December

item.title: Someone threw a door right in front of my home, 15th December
item.description:
I live in 50, Littlemede, SE93EB. Someone on Sunday, 14th December ,2025 night threw a door right in front of my front yard. I would like to have this removed please. My door camera could not capture anything in the night unfortunately.

item.title: Water access cover is leaking, 15th December
